results.title: Markedly improved glycemic control and enhanced insulin sensitivity in a patient with type 2 diabetes complicated by a suprasellar tumor treated with pioglitazone and metformin.
results.text_hl: Markedly improved glycemic control and enhanced @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ complicated by a @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Cysts</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020863 @@@suprasellar tumor@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
